## Field.configure\_() method

Process the configuration map passed to the field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected configure_(config: AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | AnyDuringMigration | A map of options used to configure the field. See the individual field's documentation for a list of properties this parameter supports. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
